title: Verify 'Clear to Close'
description: An agent must coordinate with the lender and title company to confirm that all conditions are met for the transaction to close.

tasks.description: Contact the buyer's mortgage lender to confirm they have issued the 'clear to close'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives written confirmation from the lender that the loan is approved and funded.

tasks.description: Contact the title company to ensure the title search is complete and there are no liens or encumbrances.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the title is clear.

tasks.description: Notify all parties (buyer, seller, other agent) that the transaction is officially clear to close and confirm the closing appointment.
tasks.expected_outcome: A confirmation email is sent to all stakeholders.
